system.sustained:
Choose one of the following effects, and retain it as long as power is sustained: Gain one Trait: Burrower (1), Crawler, Dark Sight, Flyer, Hoverer, Natural Armour (2), Natural Weapons, or Quadruped. Assume the appearance of any one creature, gaining Disguise Skill and +10 to using it, or +20 if already had skill. Gain Natural Weapons (Bite, Claws, Etc) to deal 1d10 + SB damage.
This power can be manifested multiple times, gaining a different bonus each time.
